trans-unit.source: Returns an alternative logical parent for this element if there is no visual parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有视觉父级，则返回此元素的备用逻辑父级。

trans-unit.source: In this case, a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> parent is always the same value as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 父级始终与 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent" /> 属性具有相同值。

trans-unit.source: Returns something other than <see langword="null" /> whenever a WPF framework-level implementation of this method has a non-visual parent connection.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法的 WPF 框架级别实现具有非视觉父级连接时，即返回 <see langword="null" /> 之外的内容。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns the expected single visual parent.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现返回预期的单个视觉父级。

trans-unit.source: Custom implementations might return alternate parent relationships.
trans-unit.target: 自定义实现可能会返回备用父关系。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 初始化此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: This coincides with cases where the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsInitialized" /> property changes from <see langword="false" /> (or undefined) to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 这与 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsInitialized" /> 属性值从 <see langword="false" />（或未定义）更改为 <see langword="true" /> 的情况相符。

trans-unit.source: This event will be raised whenever the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.EndInit%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnInitialized%2A> methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 此事件将引发每当<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.EndInit%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnInitialized%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Calls to these methods could have been made by deliberate code, or by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] loading process.
trans-unit.target: 对这些方法的调用可能已进行了通过故意代码，或通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]加载过程。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the context for input used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 使用的输入的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The input scope, which modifies how input from alternative input methods is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 解释输入范围，在该输入范围内修改从其他输入法输入的方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" /> (which results in a default handling of commands).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />（这导致对命令的默认处理）。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property inherits property values.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖属性继承属性值。

trans-unit.source: If there are child elements with no other value for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A> established through local values or styles, the property system will set the value to be the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A> value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何其他值的子元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>建立通过本地值或样式，属性系统将设置此值为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>分配有此值最接近的父元素的值。

trans-unit.source: Although a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax usage is listed and is syntactically allowed, setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is not common.
trans-unit.target: 尽管[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法使用情况列出和语法允许，则将此属性设置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]并不常见。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.InputScope" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.InputScope" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this element has been initialized, either by being loaded as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], or by explicitly having its <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.EndInit" /> method called.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已通过将此元素作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 加载或显式调用它的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.EndInit" /> 方法初始化此元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is initialized per the aforementioned loading or method calls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已通过上述加载或方法调用初始化了此元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property may also be `true` if this element has been moved within the element tree such that it has a new parent element, and therefore becomes reloaded again.
trans-unit.target: 此属性也可能是`true`如果此元素已在元素树中以便它有一个新的父元素，并因此重新。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this element has been loaded for presentation.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已加载此元素以供显示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current element is attached to an element tree and has been rendered; <see langword="false" /> if the element has never been attached to a loaded element tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前元素附加到元素树且已呈现，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果元素从未附加到加载的元素树中，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: From a newly constructed instance, this property starts off `false`, and remains `true` once it is set to `true`, even if subsequently removed by code.
trans-unit.target: 从新构造的实例，该属性开始`false`，并保留`true`后设置为`true`，即使随后由代码中删除。

trans-unit.source: The following example code uses <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsLoaded%2A> as a conditional check to assure that a function `displayData` (not shown) will have valid elements loaded on the page to work against, as part of an on-demand handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsLoaded%2A>用作条件检查，以确保函数`displayData`（未显示） 将具有有效元素上加载页后，可以针对、 按需处理程序的一部分工作。

trans-unit.source: That same logic is run as an event handler for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded>.
trans-unit.target: 作为事件处理程序运行时相同的逻辑<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets localization/globalization language information that applies to an individual element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于单个元素的本地化/全球化语言信息。

trans-unit.source: The culture information for this element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素的区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> instance with its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag" /> value set to the string "en-US".
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> 实例，它的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag" /> 值设置为字符串“en-US”。

trans-unit.source: The string formats follow the RFC 3066 standard.
trans-unit.target: 字符串格式遵循 RFC 3066 标准。

trans-unit.source: For example, U.S. English is "en-US".
trans-unit.target: 例如，美国英语是"EN-US"。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> for more information on the values and format.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>有关详细信息的值和格式。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property inherits property values.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖属性继承属性值。

trans-unit.source: If there are child elements with no other value for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> established through local values or styles, the property system will set the value to be the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何其他值的子元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>建立通过本地值或样式，属性系统将设置此值为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>分配有此值最接近的父元素的值。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Language" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Language" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element is laid out, rendered, and ready for interaction.
trans-unit.target: 当对元素进行布局、呈现，且可将其用于交互时发生。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件不遵循路由，而仅处理引发它们时对同一元素中。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件是否支持其他路由的事件行为： 它们支持的可访问的处理程序集合，并可用作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>样式。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded" /> [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded" /> [路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Event identifier objects are created when routed events are registered (see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>) and can then be used to add class handlers (see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由的事件时创建事件标识符对象 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>)，然后可以使用添加类处理程序 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: Identifier objects contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 标识符对象包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the logical child elements of this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此元素的逻辑子元素的一个枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for logical child elements of this element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素的逻辑子元素的一个枚举数。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息如何使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.LogicalChildren%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>，请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The direction that focus is to be moved, as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 焦点要移动的方向，作为一个枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Moves the keyboard focus from this element to another element.
trans-unit.target: 将键盘焦点从此元素移到另一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if focus is moved successfully; <see langword="false" /> if the target element in direction as specified does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果焦点成功移动，则返回 <see langword="true" />；如果指定方向上的目标元素不存在，则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifying name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的标识名称。

trans-unit.source: The name provides an instance reference so that programmatic code-behind, such as event handler code, can refer to an element once it is constructed during parsing of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 该名称提供实例引用，以便编程代码隐藏（如事件处理程序代码）可以引用曾在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 的分析过程中构造的元素。

trans-unit.source: The name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: The most common usage of this property is when specifying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element name in markup.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的最常见用法是指定时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]标记中的元素名称。

trans-unit.source: This property essentially provides a WPF framework-level convenience property to set the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md).
trans-unit.target: 此属性实质上是提供一个 WPF 框架级别便捷属性，以设置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [X:name 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。

trans-unit.source: Getting a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> from code is not common, because if you have the appropriate reference in code already, you can just call methods and properties on the element reference and do not generally need the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>代码中并不常用，因为如果你已在代码中具有适当的引用，你可以直接调用方法和属性的元素上引用且通常并不需要<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An exception is if the string has some overloaded meaning, for instance if it is useful to display that name in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 例外情况是字符串具有某些重载的含义，例如有用中显示该名称是否[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Setting a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> from code if the original <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> was set from markup is also not recommended, and changing the property will not change the object reference.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>代码中如果原始<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>已从标记中的设置也不建议，并且更改该属性不会更改对象引用。

trans-unit.source: Such object references are created only when the underlying namescopes are explicitly created during [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] loading.
trans-unit.target: 仅当基础名称范围显式创建期间创建此类对象引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]加载。

trans-unit.source: You must specifically call <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.RegisterName%2A> to make an effective change on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> property of an already loaded element.
trans-unit.target: 你必须明确调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.RegisterName%2A>以进行有效的更改上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>已加载的元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: One notable case where setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> from code is important is for naming elements that storyboards will run against.
trans-unit.target: 一个值得一提设置情况<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>从代码很重要的命名元素演示图板将针对运行。

trans-unit.source: Before you can register a name, might also need to instantiate and assign a <xref:System.Windows.NameScope> instance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以注册名称之前，可能还需要实例化并分配<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>实例。

trans-unit.source: See the Example section, or [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅示例部分中，或[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> from code has limited applications, but looking up an element by name is more common, particularly if you are employing a navigation model where pages reload into the application and the run-time code is not necessarily the code-behind of that respective page.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>从代码具有有限的应用程序，但按名称查找元素并更常用，尤其是在你采用一种导航模型到应用程序重新加载页面，其中的运行时代码不一定的代码隐藏相应的页。

trans-unit.source: The utility method <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.FindName%2A>, which is available from any <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>, can find any element by <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> in that element's logical tree recursively.
trans-unit.target: 实用工具方法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.FindName%2A>，这是可从任何<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>，可以找到任何元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>中该元素的逻辑树以递归方式。

trans-unit.source: Or you can use the <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.FindLogicalNode%2A> static method of <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>, which also takes the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> string as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.FindLogicalNode%2A>静态方法<xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>，其还会<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>作为自变量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Commonly used root elements (<xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> for example) implement the interface <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>.
trans-unit.target: 常用根元素 (<xref:System.Windows.Window>，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>例如) 实现的接口<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this interface are expected to enforce that names be unambiguous within their scope.
trans-unit.target: 此接口的实现需要强制该名称是明确在其范围内。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Provides data about the event.
trans-unit.target: 提供与事件有关的数据。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuClosing" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 每当 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuClosing" /> 路由事件在其路由中到达此类时调用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不具有默认实现。

trans-unit.source: You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用基实现。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 * 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 因为路由的事件可能由一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发，On * 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的实现将需要考虑事件参数的源属性 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子类<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.
trans-unit.target: 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。

trans-unit.source: Event data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuOpening" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 每当 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuOpening" /> 路由事件在其路由中到达此类时调用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不具有默认实现。

trans-unit.source: You should still call base() in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用 base （）。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 * 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: On * 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子类<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.
trans-unit.target: 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。

trans-unit.source: Event data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Class handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotFocus" /> 事件的类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This class handler sets appropriate focus behavior on this element if the event originated from this element.
trans-unit.target: 如果该事件来源于此元素，此类处理程序在此元素上设置相应的焦点行为。

trans-unit.source: If the event's source was another element in the tree, the handler does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件的源树中的另一个元素，该处理程序将没有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in order to change these default focusing behavior on your element.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改这些默认焦点行为元素上，重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: Event data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Initialized" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Initialized" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsInitialized" /> is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 只要将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsInitialized" /> 设置为 <see langword="true" />，就可以调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this virtual method raises the event as described earlier in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中前面所述，此虚方法的默认实现将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Overrides should call base() to preserve this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 重写应调用 base （） 来保留此行为。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsInitialized%2A> property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsInitialized%2A>属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot set it to force initialization behavior that way.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你不能将其设置为强制初始化行为通过这种方式。

trans-unit.source: Initialization setting is intended to be done only by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework.
trans-unit.target: 初始化设置旨在只能由[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]framework。

trans-unit.source: The event data that describes the property that changed, including the old and new values.
trans-unit.target: 描述已更改的属性的事件数据，包括旧值和新值。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 每当更新此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 上任何依赖项属性的有效值时调用。

trans-unit.source: The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将在实参形参中报告已更改的特定依赖属性。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged(System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged(System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to generally detect property changes or invalidations.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应通常检测属性更改或失效。

trans-unit.source: It is instead intended for modifications of the general invalidation pattern if certain information is known about wide classifications of properties.
trans-unit.target: 它而被旨在用于修改常规失效模式如果查阅宽分类的属性已知的某些信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is potentially invoked many times during the life of an object.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可能很多时候一个对象的生命周期内。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can achieve better performance if you override the metadata of specific properties and then attach <xref:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback> or <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> functions for individual properties.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你可以实现更好的性能，如果重写特定属性的元数据，然后将附加<xref:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback>或<xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback>为各个属性的函数。

trans-unit.source: However, you would use this method if a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> includes a significant number of value-interrelated dependency properties, or if it includes logic such as rendering behavior that must be rerun for several related cases of property invalidations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你将使用此方法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>包括大量的值相关的依赖项属性，或如果它包括逻辑，如呈现行为，必须重新运行多个相关属性失效的情况。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is an identically named `OnPropertyChanged` method with a different signature (the parameter type is <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>) that can appear on a number of classes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，没有具有相同名称`OnPropertyChanged`用不同的签名的方法 (该参数类型是<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>)，可能出现在多个类。

trans-unit.source: That `OnPropertyChanged` is used for data object notifications, and is part of the contract for <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>.
trans-unit.target: `OnPropertyChanged`用于数据对象通知，并且是协定的一部分<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>。

trans-unit.source: Always call the base implementation, as the first operation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 始终调用基实现中，为您的实现中的第一个操作。

trans-unit.source: Failure to do this will significantly disable the entire [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system, which causes incorrect values to be reported.
trans-unit.target: 如果不这样做将显著禁用整个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统，这会导致不正确的值进行报告。

trans-unit.source: The old style.
trans-unit.target: 旧样式。

trans-unit.source: The new style.
trans-unit.target: 新样式。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the style that is in use on this element changes.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素上使用的样式更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: This method has a default implementation that sets an internal flag noting the style changed condition.
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有一个默认实现，设置一个内部标志指明样式更改条件。

trans-unit.source: Always call the base implementation, otherwise styles cannot be applied.
trans-unit.target: 始终调用基实现，否则不能应用样式。

trans-unit.source: Scenarios for overriding this method might include if your derived class has a specialized style selector, or caches style values.
trans-unit.target: 如果你派生的类具有专用的样式选择器，或缓存样式值，可能会包括重写此方法的方案。

trans-unit.source: Theme changes will potentially invoke this method.
trans-unit.target: 主题更改很可能将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides data about the event.
trans-unit.target: 提供与事件有关的数据。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 每当 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing" /> 路由事件在其路由中到达此类时调用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不具有默认实现。

trans-unit.source: You should still call base() in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用 base （）。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 * 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: On * 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子类<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.
trans-unit.target: 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。

trans-unit.source: Provides data about the event.
trans-unit.target: 提供与事件有关的数据。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 每当 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening" /> 路由事件在其路由中到达此类时调用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不具有默认实现。

trans-unit.source: You should still call base() in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用 base （）。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 * 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: On * 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子类<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.
trans-unit.target: 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this element incorporates style properties from theme styles.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此元素是否合并了主题样式的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element does not use theme style properties; all style-originating properties come from local application styles, and theme style properties do not apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素不使用主题样式属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；所有源于样式的属性均来自本地应用程序样式，不会应用主题样式属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if application styles apply first, and then theme styles apply for properties that were not specifically set in application styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果首先应用了应用程序样式，然后将主题样式应用于未在应用程序样式中专门设置的属性，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The most common usage of this property is an indirect usage within the setter of a style that is supplying a themed style.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的最常见用法是一种间接使用正提供主题样式的样式的 setter 中。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OverridesDefaultStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OverridesDefaultStyle" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent in the logical tree for this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此元素的逻辑树中的父级。

trans-unit.source: The logical parent for this element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素的逻辑父级。

trans-unit.source: Note that the logical parent of an element can potentially change depending on your application functionality, and keeping the value of this property will not reflect that change.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，具体取决于应用程序功能，可能发生更改的元素的逻辑父级，并且此属性的值保持将不会反映所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: You typically should get the value immediately before you need it.
trans-unit.target: 你需要它之前，你通常应获取的值。

trans-unit.source: See [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md) for more information about traversing logical trees, and the scenarios where taking this approach towards element discovery is appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)有关遍历其中采取针对元素发现这种方法合适的逻辑树和方案的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The property system will potentially recalculate all property values of an element when it is reparented, because some properties inherit values through the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 属性系统将可能重新计算此元素的所有属性值时父级，因为某些属性继承值通过逻辑树。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A> that applies for bindings can also change when elements are reparented.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>适用于元素是父级，还可以更改绑定。

trans-unit.source: Changing an element's parent is typically only done through manipulation of collections, by using dedicated add or remove methods, or through setting content properties of elements.
trans-unit.target: 更改元素的父通常只是对集合的操作，通过使用专用添加或删除方法，或通过设置的元素的内容属性。

trans-unit.source: The most typical scenario for using the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A> property is to obtain a reference and then get various <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> property values from the parent.
trans-unit.target: 使用最典型的情形<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A>属性是获得的引用，然后获取各种<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>从父属性值。

trans-unit.source: For templates, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A> of the template eventually will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 对于模板，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A>模板的最终将`null`。

trans-unit.source: To get past this point and extend into the logical tree where the template is actually applied, use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TemplatedParent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要忽略这一点并扩展到实际将应用的模板的逻辑树，请使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TemplatedParent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks to see whether the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> is of a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检查以查看是否<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>是否属于特定类型。

trans-unit.source: The direction for which a prospective focus change should be determined.
trans-unit.target: 应确定其预期焦点更改的方向。

trans-unit.source: Determines the next element that would receive focus relative to this element for a provided focus movement direction, but does not actually move the focus.
trans-unit.target: 根据提供的焦点移动方向，确定在此元素之后接收焦点的下一个元素，但不实际移动焦点。

trans-unit.source: This method is sealed and cannot be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是密封的，不能对其进行重写。

trans-unit.source: The next element that focus would move to if focus were actually traversed.
trans-unit.target: 如果实际遍历了焦点，则为焦点将要移到的下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: May return <see langword="null" /> if focus cannot be moved relative to this element for the provided direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果焦点不能按提供的方向相对于此元素移动，则可能返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.MoveFocus%2A> is the related method that actually does move focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.MoveFocus%2A> 是实际移动焦点的相关的方法。

trans-unit.source: Specified one of the following directions in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" />: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.First" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Last" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" /> 中指定了以下方向之一：<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.First" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Last" />。

trans-unit.source: These directions are not legal for <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.PredictFocus(System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection)" /> (but they are legal for <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.MoveFocus(System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest)" />).
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.PredictFocus(System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection)" /> 来说，这些方向是非法的（但对于 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.MoveFocus(System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest)" /> 来说是合法的）。

trans-unit.source: Name to use for the specified name-object mapping.
trans-unit.target: 要在指定的名称-对象映射中使用的名称。

trans-unit.source: Object for the mapping.
trans-unit.target: 映射的对象。

trans-unit.source: Provides an accessor that simplifies access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" /> registration method.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个可简化对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" /> 注册方法访问的访问器。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenience method for calling <xref:System.Windows.NameScope.RegisterName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是调用的便捷方法<xref:System.Windows.NameScope.RegisterName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The implementation will check successive parent elements until it finds the applicable <xref:System.Windows.NameScope> implementation, which is found by finding an element that implements <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>.
trans-unit.target: 该实现将检查连续的父元素，直到它找到适用<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>实现，它可以通过查找元素实现<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about namescopes, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关名称范围的详细信息，请参阅[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.RegisterName%2A> is necessary in order to correctly hook up animation storyboards for applications when created in code.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.RegisterName%2A>为正确挂钩的应用程序时在代码中创建动画演示图板是必需的。

trans-unit.source: This is because one of the key storyboard properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName%2A>, uses a run-time name lookup instead of being able to take a reference to a target element.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为其中一个主要情节提要属性， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName%2A>，而不是能够充分目标元素的引用中使用运行时名称查找。

trans-unit.source: This is true even if that element is accessible by reference from the code.
trans-unit.target: 即使该元素是可访问的代码中的引用，也是如此。

trans-unit.source: For more information on why you need to register names for storyboard targets, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 为何需要注册名称的情节提要目标的详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Animations for content elements are less common than animations on controls, the [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md) concentrates on control scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 为内容元素的动画并不常见上控件的动画[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)重点介绍控制方案。

trans-unit.source: The element to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的元素。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified element from the logical tree for this element.
trans-unit.target: 从该元素的逻辑树中移除指定的元素。

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] is mainly relevant for class deriving scenarios, when adding support for child collections.
trans-unit.target: 这[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]主要适用于类中派生方案中，添加对子集合的支持时。

trans-unit.source: Most <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> derived classes expose dedicated collections that are responsible for containment (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span.Inlines%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span> class; <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section.Blocks%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> class).
trans-unit.target: 大多数<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>派生的类公开负责包容的专用的集合 (例如，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span.Inlines%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span>类;<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section.Blocks%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section>类)。

trans-unit.source: Deriving from such classes typically can avoid any need to manipulate the logical tree directly.
trans-unit.target: 派生自这些类通常可以避免任何需要直接处理逻辑树。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current locally-defined resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前本地定义的资源字典。

trans-unit.source: The current locally-defined resources.
trans-unit.target: 当前本地定义的资源。

trans-unit.source: This is a dictionary of resources, where resources within the dictionary are accessed by key.
trans-unit.target: 这是一本资源字典，可通过键来访问字典中的资源。

trans-unit.source: Resource dictionaries that can be defined completely or partially in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] are typically created as a property element, and are typically on the root element for any individual page or for the application.
trans-unit.target: 可以完全或部分中定义的资源字典[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通常创建为一个属性元素，并且通常是根元素为任何单个页面或应用程序上。

trans-unit.source: Placing the resource dictionary at this level makes it easier to find from individual child elements in the page (or from any page, in the application case).
trans-unit.target: 将在此级别的资源字典便于查找从页面中的各个子元素 （或任何页上，在应用程序的情况下）。

trans-unit.source: In most application scenarios, we recommend that styles be defined as object elements within a resource dictionary, or be defined as external resources so that the entire style resource can be self-contained (this approach helps separate designer responsibilities from developer responsibilities by separating the physical files that need to be edited).
trans-unit.target: 在大多数应用程序方案中，我们建议作为对象元素使用的资源字典中定义样式或作为外部资源定义整个样式资源可以是自包含 （此方法有助于单独的设计器从开发人员通过将需要编辑物理文件分开的责任职责）。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property returns only the resource dictionary declared directly within that element.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此属性返回直接在该元素内声明仅的资源字典。

trans-unit.source: This is different than the actual resource lookup process, where a child element can access any of the resources defined in each parent element, searching recursively upwards.
trans-unit.target: 此函数不同于实际资源查找过程中，子元素可以访问任何向上递归搜索每个父元素中定义的资源。

trans-unit.source: Resources can also be referenced by code from within the collection, but be aware that resources created in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will definitely not be accessible until after <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded> is raised by the element that declares the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 资源在集合中，从代码也可以引用，但请注意资源创建在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]肯定不可访问，直到<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded>引起声明该字典的元素。

trans-unit.source: In fact, resources are parsed asynchronously, and not even the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded> event is an assurance that you can reference a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resource.
trans-unit.target: 事实上，资源以异步方式分析和甚至不<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded>事件是保证可引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义资源。

trans-unit.source: For this reason you should generally only access [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resources as part of run-time code, or through other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] techniques such as styles or resource extension references for attribute values.
trans-unit.target: 因此你通常只应访问[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义资源作为的一部分运行时代码，或通过其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]技术，如样式或特性值的资源扩展引用。

trans-unit.source: When you access resources through code, it is essentially equivalent to a reference made from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 通过代码访问资源时，它是实质上等同于从进行的引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> supports the methods required to add, remove, or query resources from within the collection by using code.
trans-unit.target: 基础<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>支持添加、 删除或通过使用代码查询从集合中的资源所需的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources%2A> property is settable to support the scenario of completely replacing the resources collection of an element to be a new or different <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources%2A>属性是可以设置以支持以下场景： 完全替换的元素为一个新的或不同的资源集合<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax shown does not include an element for the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]所示的语法不包含的元素<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: This is an example of implicit collection syntax; a tag representing the collection element can be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 这是隐式集合语法; 一个示例可以省略表示集合元素的标记。

trans-unit.source: The elements that are added as items to the collection are specified instead.
trans-unit.target: 改为指定为项添加到集合的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about implicit collections and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关隐式集合的详细信息和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，请参阅[在详细信息的 XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。

trans-unit.source: One case where a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> is still specified explicitly as an element is if you are introducing a merged dictionary, in which case there are typically no child elements for that <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 一种情况下其中<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>仍显式指定引入合并的字典，这种情况下是否存在通常没有子元素，该元素原样<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[合并资源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreResourceElements*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreResourceElements*

trans-unit.source: One or more object elements, each of which defines a resource.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个对象元素，其中每个定义的资源。

trans-unit.source: Each resource property element within each <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> must have a unique value for the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md), which serves as the unique key when values are retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个每个资源属性元素<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>必须具有唯一值[X:key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)，它用作唯一键时将从检索值<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: The following example establishes a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources%2A> collection on a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> root element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例建立<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>根元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is a typical choice because it is one of the few <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes that make sense as a root element, and resources are generally stored at the page root or at even higher levels such as in the application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> 是一个典型的选择，因为它是一个少数<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>根元素，以及资源有意义的类通常存储在页面根或更高级别的如应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a binding to this element for the specified dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的依赖属性向此元素附加一个绑定。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the bound property.
trans-unit.target: 标识绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: The source property name or the path to the property used for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 源属性名称或用于绑定的属性的路径。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a binding to this element, based on the provided source property name as a path qualification to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 将提供的源属性名作为数据源的路径限定，从而将绑定附加到此元素上。

trans-unit.source: Records the conditions of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 记录绑定的条件。

trans-unit.source: This return value can be useful for error checking.
trans-unit.target: 此返回值可用于错误检查。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenience method for calling <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which passes the current instance as the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>, and creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> based on the provided `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是调用的便捷方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，后者将当前实例作为传递<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>，并创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>根据所提供`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: This signature is more convenient if you are establishing a simple default binding.
trans-unit.target: 此签名会更方便，当您要建立简单的默认绑定。

trans-unit.source: If you need to specify any binding properties to non-default conditions, or want to use a <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>,you should use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.SetBinding%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Data.BindingBase%29> signature.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要指定任何绑定属性为非默认条件，或想要使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>，应使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.SetBinding%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Data.BindingBase%29>签名。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets a binding on a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> element, by creating a new custom data object, establishing that object as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>, and setting the binding path to a property within it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置的绑定上<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>元素，通过创建一个新的自定义数据对象，建立该对象作为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>，并将绑定路径设置为在其中一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the bound property.
trans-unit.target: 标识绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Represents a data binding.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a binding to this element, based on the provided binding object.
trans-unit.target: 基于已提供的绑定对象将一个绑定附加到此元素上。

trans-unit.source: Records the conditions of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 记录绑定的条件。

trans-unit.source: This return value can be useful for error checking.
trans-unit.target: 此返回值可用于错误检查。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenience method for calling <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which passes the current instance as the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是调用的便捷方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，后者将当前实例作为传递<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets a binding on a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> element, by creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> and setting the source to a newly built `DateTime` object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置的绑定上<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>元素，通过创建新<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>和将源设置为新生成`DateTime`对象。

trans-unit.source: The property to which the resource is bound.
trans-unit.target: 资源绑定到的属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 资源的名称。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a resource with the specified name and sets up a resource reference to it for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定名称的资源，并且为指定的属性设置一个指向该资源的资源引用。

trans-unit.source: A resource reference is similar to the use of a [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) in markup.
trans-unit.target: 资源引用相当于使用[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)标记中。

trans-unit.source: The resource reference creates an internal expression that supplies the value of the specified property on a run-time deferred basis.
trans-unit.target: 资源引用创建提供根据延迟特定的运行时间的指定属性的值的内部表达式。

trans-unit.source: The expression will be re-evaluated whenever the resource dictionary indicates a changed value through internal events, or whenever the current element is reparented (a parent change would change the dictionary lookup path).
trans-unit.target: 该表达式将重新计算每当资源字典指示通过内部事件，更改的值或父级的当前元素 （父级更改会更改的字典查找路径）。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources" /> property on instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列化进程是否应在此类的实例上序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources" /> 属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应当序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources" /> 属性值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This will return `true` so long as there is at least one keyed resource in the local <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回`true`只要本地没有至少一个键控的资源<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style" /> property on instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列化进程是否应在此类的实例上序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style" /> 属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应当序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style" /> 属性值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This will return `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.Style> is locally set.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回`true`如果<xref:System.Windows.Style>本地设置。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any associated data source participating in a binding on this element changes.
trans-unit.target: 当参与此元素上的绑定的任意关联数据源更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event surfaces the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated> event that is raised by any <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件曲面<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated>引发任何事件<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>与此元素关联。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style to be used by this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此元素要使用的样式。

trans-unit.source: The applied, nondefault style for the element, if present.
trans-unit.target: 若存在，则为此元素适用的非默认样式。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The default for a default-constructed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下构造的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current style is often provided by a default style from theming, or from styles generally applied to objects of that type by resources at page or application level (an implicit style).
trans-unit.target: 从主题，或从通常通过在页面或应用程序级别 （隐式样式） 的资源应用于该类型的对象的样式的默认样式通常提供当前样式。

trans-unit.source: This property does not set or return default (theme) styles, but it does return the implicit style or an explicit style.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不未设置或返回默认值 （主题） 样式，但它返回的隐式样式或显式样式。

trans-unit.source: In the case of implicit or explicit styles, it does not matter whether the style is accessed as a resource or defined locally.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在隐式或显式样式，它并不重要的样式是访问作为资源还是本地定义。

trans-unit.source: Setting the styles has some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 设置样式有一些限制。

trans-unit.source: You can reset the entire <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Style> at any time, which will force a layout recomposition.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重置整个<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style%2A>到新的属性<xref:System.Windows.Style>任何时候，这将强制布局重新组合。

trans-unit.source: However, as soon as that style is placed in use by a loaded element, the <xref:System.Windows.Style> should be considered sealed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，只要该样式加载的元素，置于使用<xref:System.Windows.Style>应视为密封。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to make a change to any individual property of an in-use style (such as anything within the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A>) causes an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 尝试对正在使用样式任何单个属性进行更改 (如在集合内的任何内容<xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A>) 将导致异常引发。

trans-unit.source: A style that is defined in markup is considered to be in use as soon as it is loaded from a resource dictionary (for resources), or the page it is contained within is loaded (for inline styles).
trans-unit.target: 在标记中定义样式被视为一旦加载从资源字典 （对于资源），或包含在页面加载 （对于内联样式），可使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style%2A> is a dependency property with special precedence.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style%2A> 是具有特殊优先级依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The locally set style generally operates at the highest precedence in the property system.
trans-unit.target: 本地设置样式通常最高优先级会在运行属性系统。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style%2A> is null at this point, during loading the property system checks for implicit styles as defined resources that specify that type.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style%2A>属性系统检查隐式样式为指定该类型的定义资源加载期间在此情况下，为 null。

trans-unit.source: If the style is still null after this step, then the style comes from the default (theme) style, but the default style is not returned in the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此步骤后，该样式为仍 null 则样式来自默认 （主题） 样式，但默认样式中将不返回<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: See [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.target: *resourceExtension*

trans-unit.source: One of the following: , or .

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.target: *styleResourceKey*

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: 标识所请求的样式的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 该键引用中的现有资源<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 属性元素语法是从技术上讲是可行的但不是建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 绑定引用使用或<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>也是可行的但不常见。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example establishes a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources%2A> collection on a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> root element and then references it as a resource as a specific style for a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例建立<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Resources%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>根元素，且然后引用它作为为特定样式资源<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Style" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the requested ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 请求的环境属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient.IsAmbientPropertyAvailable(System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参见 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient.IsAmbientPropertyAvailable(System.String)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="propertyName" /> is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 可用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an arbitrary object value that can be used to store custom information about this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置任意对象值，该值可用于存储关于此元素的自定义信息。

trans-unit.source: The intended value.
trans-unit.target: 预期值。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property is analogous to Tag properties in other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ms](~/includes/tlasharptla-ms-md.md)] programming models, such as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_vba](~/includes/tlasharptla-vba-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此属性是类似于在其他标记属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ms](~/includes/tlasharptla-ms-md.md)]编程模型，如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_vba](~/includes/tlasharptla-vba-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: It is intended to provide a pre-existing place to store some basic custom information about any element without forcing application developers to subclass.
trans-unit.target: 它旨在提供一个预先存在的空间来存储而不进行强制子类化的应用程序开发人员的有关任何元素的一些基本的自定义信息。

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: Because this property takes an object, you would need to use the property element usage in order to set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Tag%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] to anything other than an object with a known and built-in type converter, such as a string.
trans-unit.target: 因为此属性采用对象，你将需要使用以便设置的属性元素用法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Tag%2A>中的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]带已知和内置类型转换器，如字符串对象之外的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Objects used in this way are typically not within the standard [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] namespaces and therefore may require namespace mapping to the external namespace in order to be introduced as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: 在这种方式中使用的对象通常并不位于标准[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]命名空间，因此可能需要将命名空间映射到外部命名空间，以便作为引入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]元素。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Tag" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Tag" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any associated target property participating in a binding on this element changes.
trans-unit.target: 当参与此元素上的绑定的任意关联目标属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event surfaces the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated> event that is raised by any <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件曲面<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated>引发任何事件<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>与此元素关联。

trans-unit.source: This usually means that the binding in question is a two-way binding, and that the bound dependency property affirms an invalidation of the previous property value per any validation or caching scheme that the property supports.
trans-unit.target: 这通常意味着所讨论的绑定是一个双向绑定，并且绑定依赖项属性的确定每个任何验证或缓存属性支持的方案的以前属性值无效。

trans-unit.source: The event arguments of this event will inform you which bound property was changed.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的事件自变量会通知你绑定属性已更改。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the template parent of this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取对此元素的模板父级的引用。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant if the element was not created through a template.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素不是通过模板创建的，则此属性无关。

trans-unit.source: The element whose <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.VisualTree" /> caused this element to be created.
trans-unit.target: 元素其<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.VisualTree" />导致要创建此元素。

trans-unit.source: This value is frequently <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值通常为<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Templates are actually shared objects, where the contents of the template are created only once.
trans-unit.target: 模板是实际共享的对象，其中仅一次创建模板的内容。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you obtain an object reference to an element that came from a template, you may find that the apparent logical tree does not reach to the page root.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你获取对来自模板的元素的对象引用，你可能会发现明显的逻辑树无法到达页面根。

trans-unit.source: In order to connect such a template reference to the page's logical tree, you should get the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TemplatedParent%2A> value and continue to navigate that element tree as desired.
trans-unit.target: 若要连接到该页面的逻辑树这样的模板引用，则应获取<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TemplatedParent%2A>值并继续根据需要该元素树中导航。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TemplatedParent%2A> will frequently be `null` for common objects, because if you have obtained an object reference from out of a page in your application through typical means, that element probably was not created from a template.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TemplatedParent%2A> 将通常为`null`对常见对象，因为如果你通过常用方法的应用程序中获取对象引用从页面外的，该元素可能不根据创建模板。

trans-unit.source: Cases where <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TemplatedParent%2A> might not be `null` would include operations such as hit-testing, event handling for certain low-level input events, or working with enumerators, which may have returned elements that came from templates.
trans-unit.target: 情况<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TemplatedParent%2A>可能不是`null`应包括处理某些低级别的输入事件，或使用枚举器，可能返回来自模板的元素命中测试、 事件等操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tool-tip object that is displayed for this element in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中为此元素显示的工具提示对象。

trans-unit.source: The tooltip object.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示对象。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>, then that is the tool-tip that will be used in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>，则它就是将用于工具提示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If the value is of any other type, then that value will be used as the *content* for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> provided (constructed) by the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为的任何其他类型，则该值将用作*内容*为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>提供 （构造） 系统。

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>。

trans-unit.source: The service class provides attached properties that can be used to further customize a tool-tip.
trans-unit.target: 服务类提供了可用来进一步自定义工具提示的附加的属性。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *toolTipContent*
trans-unit.target: *toolTipContent*

trans-unit.source: A string that becomes the display text for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将成为显示的文本字符串<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A>。

trans-unit.source: *toolTipObjectContent*
trans-unit.target: *toolTipObjectContent*

trans-unit.source: Some object, provided in object element form, that should be used as the content for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> .
trans-unit.target: 对象元素窗体，应该用作的内容中提供的某些对象<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: Typically this would be a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or some other element that creates layout compositing for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A>, eventually containing text content within the compositing.
trans-unit.target: 通常这是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或创建的布局组合的其他某个元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A>，最终包含在该组合中的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: In this usage, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> element is created implicitly from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the *toolTipObjectContent* content is set as its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 在这种用法，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>元素创建的隐式地从已分析[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，和*经过*内容设置为其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.target: <`ToolTip` .../>

trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before any tooltip on the element is closed.
trans-unit.target: 在元素上的任何工具提示关闭之前发生。

trans-unit.source: To suppress closing the tooltip, handlers of the event should mark it as handled.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消关闭工具提示，事件的处理程序应将其标记为已处理。

trans-unit.source: This event cannot be an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不能为<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>样式。

trans-unit.source: This is because the identifier field of this event re-uses an implementation from a service that does not expose add/remove methods on the event.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为此事件的标识符字段重新使用从服务不会公开事件的添加/删除方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing" /> [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing" /> [路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Event identifier objects are created when routed events are registered (see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>) and can then be used to add class handlers (see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由的事件时创建事件标识符对象 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>)，然后可以使用添加类处理程序 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: Identifier objects contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 标识符对象包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any tooltip on the element is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在元素上的任何工具提示打开时发生。

trans-unit.source: To manually open tooltips, handlers of the events should mark the relevant event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 若要手动打开工具提示，事件的处理程序应将相关的事件标记为已处理。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A> property will be used to automatically open a context menu.
trans-unit.target: 否则为值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A>属性将用于自动打开上下文菜单。

trans-unit.source: Marking the event handled will effectively cancel the default action, and could be an opportunity to reset the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A> property and then open the new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 将标记处理的事件可有效地取消的默认操作，并且可重置的值的机会<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A>属性，然后打开新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>。

trans-unit.source: Note that this event will not be raised if <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A> is a null reference or otherwise unset.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否将不会引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A>为空引用或其他取消设置。

trans-unit.source: This event cannot be an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不能为<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>样式。

trans-unit.source: This is because the identifier field of this event re-uses an implementation from a service that does not expose add/remove methods on the event.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为此事件的标识符字段重新使用从服务不会公开事件的添加/删除方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: Key identifier of the resource to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的资源的键标识符。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a resource with the specified key, and returns that resource if found.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定键的资源，如果找到，则返回该资源。

trans-unit.source: The found resource.
trans-unit.target: 找到的资源。

trans-unit.source: If no resource was found, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到资源，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the resource is not found on the calling element, the parent tree is searched using the logical tree, in the same way that the tree would be searched if a dynamic resource reference were requested by key at run-time.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用元素上未找到资源，使用在树的方法相同的逻辑树中，搜索父树由在运行时的参数请求的动态资源引用时搜索。

trans-unit.source: Typically you would immediately cast the return value to the type of the property that you were attempting to set with the returned resource value.
trans-unit.target: 通常将立即强制转换为已尝试用返回的资源值进行设置的属性的类型的返回值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.FindResource%2A> method has similar behavior, except that it will throw an exception in the case of not finding a resource with the provided key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.FindResource%2A>方法具有类似的行为，只不过它将在不具有所提供键查找资源的情况下发生异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example finds a resource as defined in markup and applies it to a certain property of an element in response to a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例查找标记中定义的资源，并将其应用到的路由事件的响应中的某个元素的某一属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element is removed from an element tree of loaded elements.
trans-unit.target: 当从已加载元素的元素树中移除元素时发生。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件不遵循路由，而仅处理引发它们时对同一元素中。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件是否支持其他路由的事件行为： 它们支持的可访问的处理程序集合，并可用作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>样式。

trans-unit.target: 要从当前范围中移除的名称-对象对的名称。

trans-unit.target: 简化对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" /> 注销方法的访问。

trans-unit.source: You only need to un-register names if you intend to re-register another element with that same name.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要取消注册名称到如果你想要重新注册该同名的另一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Reapplies the default style to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 将默认样式重新应用至当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />。
